tab_content.accordion_title: Can I get a prescription on Maple?
tab_content.accordion_intro:
Yes. In most cases, a doctor on Maple can diagnose hypothyroidism online. Once you describe your symptoms to the doctor, they’ll be able to provide a diagnosis or a lab test requisition to confirm diagnosis, write necessary prescriptions, and recommend an appropriate course of treatment. If the doctor suspects you have a more serious problem, they may suggest that you go to a clinic for a thorough physical examination.

You can visit our How it Works page to learn more.

Hypothyroidism (also called underactive thyroid disease) occurs when your thyroid gland doesn’t make enough thyroid hormone. Thyroid hormones affect nearly every part of your body, including your heart, skin, and metabolism. If you don’t have enough thyroid hormone, your entire body’s systems can slow down.

tab_content.accordion_title: What are the symptoms of hypothyroidism?
tab_content.accordion_intro:
Symptoms of hypothyroidism include:

  • Low energy and/or fatigue
  • Unexplained weight gain or difficulty losing weight
  • Sensitivity to cold
  • Muscle weakness, aches, tenderness, and stiffness
  • Slow heart rate
  • Dry hair and hair loss
  • Dry skin
  • Constipation
  • Changes in menstrual cycle
  • Depression
  • Carpal tunnel syndrome
  • Goiter (swelling of the thyroid gland)
Hypothyroidism is easily treated with a synthetic thyroid hormone, such as levothyroxine (sold under the brand names Synthroid or L-Thyroxine). It’s a daily pill that you take every day.
